title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 7.9 - Contents of purchase orders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 7.9 - Contents of purchase orders

State Regulations

All purchase orders shall show clearly in the spaces provided
therefor, quantity, grade, discount terms, point of delivery, shipping terms, and the code of the account chargeable with the expenditure. Reference shall be
made to the Comptroller's contract number (section
7.5
of this Part) on all purchase
orders issued in accordance with a written contract previously filed in this
office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
7.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
